name: Rock Heart
description:
Game made for Yogcast Game Jam in 2 days.

Theme

Giving.

My interpretation is giving the spark of life to rock statues.

Controls

-Move with WASD or arrow keys.

-Left click to enter throw mode. Left click again to throw the Life Orb, hit another statue to bring it to life and take control over it.

-Right click in thow mode to cancel the throw.

-Restart the level with ESC.

Credits

Game made in Unity by Ebediam.

Models made in Blender by Ebediam

Music made in Bosca Ceoil by Maitheas.

Sounds made in ChipTone by Ebediam.
